Closure Testing Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2011-11-08  | Version: 1.6
Closure Testing Maven Plugin
Parent Project
  • JavaScript Framework
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

closure-testing:js-closure-test

Full name:

com.github.jlgrock.javascript-framework:closure-testing-maven-plugin:1.6:js-closure-test

Description:

Will execute the jsclosure suite in a selenium testbed and execute it, parsing values for problems. If problems arise, this can stop the build.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven 2.0 project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: test.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
testSourceDirectory File - The test source directory containing test class sources. TODO this should eventually be ${project.build.testSourceDirectory}, but the value from the maven model is not pulling in. Need to look into this.
Default value is: ${basedir}${file.separator}src${file.separator}test${file.separator}javascript.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
closureLibraryLocation File - The location of the closure library.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}${file.separator}javascriptFramework${file.separator}closure-library.
frameworkTargetDirectory File - Command line working directory. TODO this should eventually be ${project.build.testSourceDirectory}, but the value from the maven model is not pulling in. Need to look into this.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}${file.separator}javascriptFramework.
skipTests boolean - Set this to "true" to skip running tests, but still compile them. Its use is NOT RECOMMENDED, but quite convenient on occasion.
Default value is: false.
verbose boolean - Whether or not to print all values of the test cases. This will show for passing and failing tests.
Default value is: false.

Parameter Details

closureLibraryLocation:

The location of the closure library.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}${file.separator}javascriptFramework${file.separator}closure-library

frameworkTargetDirectory:

Command line working directory. TODO this should eventually be ${project.build.testSourceDirectory}, but the value from the maven model is not pulling in. Need to look into this.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}${file.separator}javascriptFramework

skipTests:

Set this to "true" to skip running tests, but still compile them. Its use is NOT RECOMMENDED, but quite convenient on occasion.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: false

testSourceDirectory:

The test source directory containing test class sources. TODO this should eventually be ${project.build.testSourceDirectory}, but the value from the maven model is not pulling in. Need to look into this.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${basedir}${file.separator}src${file.separator}test${file.separator}javascript

verbose:

Whether or not to print all values of the test cases. This will show for passing and failing tests.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: false
